tachyon.client

Class BlockInStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • tachyon.client.InStream
        • tachyon.client.BlockInStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalBlockInStream, RemoteBlockInStream

    public abstract class BlockInStream
extends InStream
    BlockInStream interface implementation of TachyonFile. To get an instance of this class, one should call the method getInStream of tachyon.client.TachyonFile, rather than constructing a new instance directly in the client code.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int mBlockIndex 
      protected boolean mClosed

      Get a new BlockInStream of the given block with the under file system configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static BlockInStream get(TachyonFile tachyonFile,
                ReadType readType,
                int blockIndex,
                TachyonConf tachyonConf)
                         throws IOException
        Get a new BlockInStream of the given block without under file system configuration. The block is decided by the tachyonFile and blockIndex
        Parameters:
        tachyonFile - the file the block belongs to
        readType - the InStream's read type
        blockIndex - the index of the block in the tachyonFile
        tachyonConf - the TachyonConf instance for this file output stream.
        Returns:
        A new LocalBlockInStream or RemoteBlockInStream
        Throws:
        IOException

      • get

        public static BlockInStream get(TachyonFile tachyonFile,
                ReadType readType,
                int blockIndex,
                Object ufsConf,
                TachyonConf tachyonConf)
                         throws IOException
        Get a new BlockInStream of the given block with the under file system configuration. The block is decided by the tachyonFile and blockIndex
        Parameters:
        tachyonFile - the file the block belongs to
        readType - the InStream's read type
        blockIndex - the index of the block in the tachyonFile
        ufsConf - the under file system configuration
        Returns:
        A new LocalBlockInStream or RemoteBlockInStream
        Throws:
        IOException
